< Hazel Jane Dickens

<Text: Hazel Dickens:  Her music was characterized not only by her high, lonesome singing style, but also by her provocative pro-union, feminist songs.>
Triplets:<Hazel Dickens
2:
--------------------
Text: Hazel Dickens:  Cultural blogger John Pietaro noted that "Dickens didn’t just sing the anthems of labor, she lived them and her place on many a picket line, staring down gunfire and goon squads, embedded her into the cause."
Triplets:<Hazel Dickens
3: pioneer among women in bluegrass music
4:
--------------------
<Text: Hazel Dickens:  With Alice Gerrard, Dickens was one of the first women to record a bluegrass album.>
